title: Getting Started with React
content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It lets you compose complex UIs from small, isolated pieces of code called components.
author: Alice Johnson

title: Node.js REST API Best Practices
content: Building a robust REST API with Node.js requires careful planning. In this post we cover error handling, validation, authentication and more.
author: Bob Smith

title: Material UI Design Tips 2
content: Material UI provides a comprehensive suite of UI tools. Learn how to theme components, use the Grid system, and build responsive layouts.
author: Carol White
